text: aur hamane jo bhee rasool bheja, vo isalie, taaki allaah kee anumati se, usakee aagya ka paalan kiya jaaye aur jab un logon ne apane oopar atyaachaar kiya, to yadi ve aapake paas aate, phir allaah se kshama yaachana karate tatha unake lie rasool kshama kee praarthana karate, to allaah ko ati kshamaasheel dayaavaan paate
